text:
R3 (https://www.r3.com/) | London | Software engineer | ONSITE

R3 is working on Corda, a distributed ledger platform. As part of this we're also working with Intel SGX, building a generic JVM-based enclave platform. Systems programming, JVM programming, distributed programming. Looking for generalists. We're using Kotlin, C++, git, k8s, yadiya.

https://jobs.lever.co/r3.com
